title: GET_CONTROL_VALUE

0xD95E79E8686D2C270xC526F3C6// GetControlValue
int GET_CONTROL_VALUE(int padIndex, int control);Parameters:padIndex: The control system instance to use. See ENABLE_ALL_CONTROL_ACTIONS.control: The control ID to check.
